original: 北海劇縣人，滕牧之女。孫皓被封烏程侯時，娶滕芳蘭為妃。之後失寵，其父牧也被徙往蒼梧，在途中憂懼而死。吳亡後，隨孫皓遷居洛陽。
text: Born in Beihai Opera County, daughter of Teng Mu. When Sun Hao was named Wu Chenghou, he married Teng Fanglan as his concubine. After falling out of favor, his father, Mu, was also moved to Cangwu, where he died of fear on the way. After Wu's death, he moved to Luoyang with Sun Hao.
